name: Hot Pink and Midnight Black Ruffle Clutch
description:
Black velvet fold over clutch lined with hot pink duponi silk giving it a beautiful glow.

Ruffle, whimsical yet elegant, adorn the front of the clutch.It is made with beautiful hot pink duponi silk and pink chamois fabric with silver touch!

This clutch folds over so you get a glimpse of the pink lining. The front tab fastens underneath with a magnetic-snap.

It is perfect with a little black dress and your most glamorous heels!

Main body:
Black
Tab:
Black Velvet
Lining:
Pink Duponi Silk
Dimensions:
Height: 14cm Length: 26cm

This bag will make a lovely gift or a fabulous treat for yourself!

Space is not an issue with this bag. Fit in your mobile, lippy, money and more without any problems!

Care Guide:
Keep away from oils and perfumes. In case of stains, dry clean only.

Disclaimer:
Exclusively handcrafted by Vdoodle Creations. Slight variations in pattern or stitch are part of the unique appeal of the product.

name: Lemon and Neon Lime frill Black Clutch
description:
Looking for elegance & class, this black velvet clutch with Lemon & Neon Lime frill is just the one to buy this season.

The bag itself is made from a rich black velvet fabric and lined with green duponi Silk. The bag has been lightly padded for stability and strength.

A luscious stripy Lemon & Neon Lime frill is stitched to the front flap of the bag. This folds over and fastens underneath with 2 mag-dots under each corner.

Dimensions:
Height: 12cm
Length: 27cm

This bag will make a lovely gift or a fabulous treat for yourself!

Space is not an issue with this bag. Fit in your mobile, lippy, money and more without any problems!

Care Guide:
Keep away from oils and perfumes. In case of stains, dry clean only.

Disclaimer:
Exclusively handcrafted by Vdoodle Creations. Slight variations in pattern or stitch are part of the unique appeal of the product.

name: Tribal Silk Thread Jewellery Set
description:
A necklace inspired by spring & a pair of vibrant bright bangles made of satin silk threads will make you look gorgeous!

Very beautiful solid colored necklaces wrapped with silk yarn adding elegance and style, also a thin Red Golden ribbon at the back which can be easily adjusted with the bead to fit any neck size.

The artistic combination of colored threads and its creative design is truly a smasher. For an added wow factor on your get-up, try this thread art and you will surely be an instant diva! A perfect gift for your loved ones!

Bangles measure about 2.5″ in diameter to accommodate an average wrist size.

These sets have a necklace and a pair of bangles!

name: Retro Rainbow Sparkling Wooden Bangles
description:
These Bangles Available in set of 4 each.

Set of 4, each with Sparkling retro colors dynamically textured.

Colors: Turquoise blue, Florescent green and Gold Yellow and vibrant red.

Material: wood.

Size: inner radius of 2.10 inches (medium)

name: Handcarved Python Bracelet
description:
From the land of snakes a very INCREDIBLE and interesting bracelet. Decorate your wrist in exotic woods with these earthy bangles.

This enchanting snake bracelet is delicately designed with Snake head and tail, fitting the hand to perfection.

This will make a lovely gift for someone special!

This wooden cuff will definitely add a pop to any ensemble! Wear it with a tank, wear it with your favorite denim jacket or with whatever you like! The possibilities are endless!

Size
The diameter is 2.10“ (medium)

Each product we create goes through many stages of sanding and finishing!
